channel.title: emily-bache on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Talk: 'Is TDD Dead? Of course not! But what´s all the fuzz about then?' by Emily Bache
item.description: I’ve just seen this talk: Is TDD dead? Of course not! But what´s all the fuzz about then? by Emily Bache ###My notes deliberate vs accidental learning (around minute 19) do not be an evangelist for tdd but rather “come learn tdd, come at a dojo with us!” points to Dan North’s talk (at the same foo café) points to her book - The Coding Dojo Handbook
